contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Don Dietrich & Jim Sauter12.jpg|thumb|right|Don Dietrich (left) & Jim Sauter; original photo courtesy Seth Tisue]] '''Don Dietrich''' is a saxophonist and founding member of [[New York City]] based improvisational group, [[Borbetomagus]].<ref>{{cite web|title =Borbetomagus: Biography |first=Chris|last=Kelsey |publisher=Allmusic| url ={{Allmusic|class=artist|id=p25447|pure_url=yes}} |accessdate =2010-10-09}}</ref> Recently, he has become involved with the noise/free jazz "supergroup" [[The New Monuments]] (with [[C. Spencer Yeh]] and [[Ben Hall (musician)|Ben Hall]]). ==References== {{reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Dietrich, Don | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Dietrich, Don}} [[Category:Avant-garde jazz musicians]] [[Category:Saxophonists]] [[Category:Living people]] {{Saxophonist-stub}}
